item.title: A Level Chemistry Paper 5 Tips
item.dc:creator: O & A Level Notes
item.description:
For planning section: 1. When asked to draw a diagram, ALWAYS mention the volume of the apparatus being used. The one most often used is gas syringe. I think it is better to limit the volume of syringe to less than 500 cm3 . Also, the volume of a commonly used small test tube is […]

The post A Level Chemistry Paper 5 Tips appeared first on O and A Level Notes.

item.title: A Levels Past Papers – (All In One) – 2001-2014
item.dc:creator: O & A Level Notes
item.description:
Along with notes, Past Papers are essential for exam preparation. But it is difficult to open websites and access individual papers. If you want to download all the A Level Past Papers of the previous 13 years you can do that now with the following links: Maths: https://mega.co.nz/#!UZ1yQaxB!aYqmxYwyMFgR5OVT0DlLxXbg-ilMpiAMie8B09Rj5Ys Physics: https://mega.co.nz/#!hEUEAJoK!Mnkl9b7-bGzbRVzEM4nsufgtzbxB-85FQmFLfVNaQLU Password For ZIP Files: sharedbytalhamuneer […]
